articles.title: Putin says Russia-US talks 'inspire hope' as Starmer set for Ukraine meeting with Trump - follow live - BBC.com
articles.description: The UK plans to give up sovereignty of the Indian Ocean territory, while keeping a UK-US base there.
articles.content:
Media caption, Starmer and Trump hold White House meeting
US President Donald Trump starts the meeting with Keir Starmer in the Oval Office with a short address.
